Name: Wonder Room
Effect: Everyone on the Battlefield will have their Defense and Sp. Defense calculated with Insight instead of Vitality. Lasts 4 Rounds. If using Insight as Sp. Defense optional rule, swap the calculation.
Description: The battlefield is now a space that puts the mind to the test. A resilient mind will be a resilient body, but if the mind is weak the body will feel frail and feeble.
